mapper.insert: insert into qna (usernum, username, qnatype, subject, content, photo,pass,writeday,regroup,restep,relevel,secret,gongzitype) values (#{usernum}, #{username}, #{qnatype}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{photo},#{pass},now(),#{regroup},#{restep},#{relevel},#{secret},#{gongzitype})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from qna
where usernum=#{usernum}
mapper.update: update reboard set restep=restep+1 where regroup=#{regroup} and restep>#{restep}
